summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1261, for the improvement of Eighth Avenue South, from Charlestown Street to Adams Street and certain parts of certain other streets therein named; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sidewalks and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 13814 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
